issue.title: cn.tingfm.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://cn.tingfm.com/?from=tingfm.com#play_id=751](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcn.tingfm.com%2F%3Ffrom%3Dtingfm.com%23play_id%3D751) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4i3x3drkhg8ws04o4c404gc0088s4osraotnzxjgb4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.21 Browser: | Edge AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.info/settings/import.html)

comment.body:
I can reproduce it.
This rule:
```adblock
tingfm.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-node-text', 'script', 'wndt.can_run_ads', '/wndt\.can_run_ads.*=.*;/', 'wndt.can_run_ads = !0;')
```
should fixes it.
I will add it.
